From: Iman Rojo <Iman.Rojo@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: Tuesday, August 5, 2025 11:37 AM
To: Dina Al Wazzan <Dina.Alwazzan@chalhoub.com>; Christian Melkane <Christian.Melkane@3d-consultants.com>
Cc: Louay Saab <Louay.Saab@chalhoub.com>; Nancy Azzi <Nancy.Azzi@3d-consultants.com>; Emmanuel Mbalaseki <Emmanuel.Mbalaseki@chalhoub.com>
Subject: Re: Zimmermann Kuwait - Pre-opening Certificates required

 

** Removing Zimmermann**

 

Hello Dina, hi Christian,

I hope you're doing well! 

 

I‚Äôd like to follow up on a few points regarding the inspections and certificates:

*                Kuwait Fire Force (KFF) Inspection & Certificate

o        Could you advise when the KFF inspection is scheduled to take place? If not yet confirmed, how long does it typically take to secure a date? The inspection will be scheduled on the first week after the opening to have the KFF license issued.

metadata.doc_id: C180MUC - zimmermann kuwait - pre-opening certificates required\Conversation.txt
metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\C180MUC - zimmermann kuwait - pre-opening certificates required\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
o        Could you advise when the KFF inspection is scheduled to take place? If not yet confirmed, how long does it typically take to secure a date? The inspection will be scheduled on the first week after the opening to have the KFF license issued.

o        Once the inspection is completed, how long does it usually take to receive the KFF Undertake Certificate? Usually it takes 1 to 2 months to receive it. Hence, it is not required to have the license since a receipt is available.

*                 Fire Protection and Detection System Maintenance Contract: @Christian Melkane could you please confirm when the KFD-approved fire fighting and fire alarm drawings will be shared with the Admin team, so they can obtain a quotation from the vendor?

*                 Insurance Clauses: @Dina Al Wazzan Could you confirm who is responsible for arranging the insurance policies. Is it the business? Are both policies mandatory for the store to open or can they be issued after the store opening? The PAR & TPL insurances are being processed by Group Insurance @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> . 

o        Property insurance against fire and burglary

o        Third-party liability insurance

*                Fire Protection System Completion Certificate: @Christian Melkane  when do you expect the fire protection system works to be completed for the certificate to be issued?

 

Many thanks in advance for your support!

Looking forward to your feedback.

 

Best regards,

Iman

 

 

IMAN ROJO

ASSOCIATE ‚Äë TECH & OMNI CHANNEL OPERATIONS

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‚Äë

Just to clarify, when you mention ‚Äúby business,‚Äù are you referring to the Chalhoub Admin teams?@Louay Saab <mailto:Louay.Saab@chalhoub.com>  if you could please confirm as well.

 

Could you please advise whether all the listed documents and certificates are mandatory for the store opening, or if any of them can be issued post-opening?

 

Additionally, could you confirm if a Civil Defence Certificate is required? We‚Äôve encountered some delays with this process in Abu Dhabi, so we‚Äôd like to ensure everything is in place well in advance for Kuwait.

 

Thanks in advance for your support.

 

Best regards,

Iman
